settings.title: WE FURNISH. YOU PROFIT.
settings.subheader: furnishing, delivery & installation for your rental space for one low price

settings.top_paragraph: Between finding the right furniture for the right price, long shipment periods, and high delivery costs, furnishing your rental space is expensive and time-consuming.
settings.bottom_top: Let us help you start making money now.
settings.bottom_bot: We will furnish, deliver, assemble, and install - all for one flat fee.

settings.step_one_paragraph: Choose one of our furnishing packages. For a flat fee, you can fill your whole space with  modern and beautiful furniture and accessories.
settings.step_two_paragraph:
Select the furniture from our catalogue to fill out your package. Need some design help? 
Chat with an expert for free.
settings.step_three_paragraph: Roomme delivers white glove service to your door, by essembling and installing all furnishings.

settings.quote: “I put off getting into the short-term rental market for years - until I found out about Roomme. My property was earning money within a couple of weeks - and I was getting 5 star reviews!”
settings.name: - Isabel M.
